transcript:
Customer: lekin ye ho sakta hai ki main ek mahine ke liye doon. Kyunki dekhiye wo ek mahina hamare level pe to bina matlab unnecessary refund lag raha hai na.
(silence)
Customer: Hamare revenue mein se minus ho jayega. Renewal mein ye add ho jayega. Agar humko renewal ka amount dena hai to ye 11 ho jayega.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji Sahil ji baat kar raha hoon.
Executive: Haan ji Sahil ji bolie.
Customer: Main keh raha tha sir ki Sabujit bol raha hoon IndiaMART se. Kal meri baat hui thi aapse. Sir dekhiye maine backend se baat kiya. Backend kya maine apne senior se upar level tak discussion kiya hai. Sir dekhiye refund ki policy hoti nahi hai. Agar hum exceptional base pe refund karenge to jitne din ki service hamari run ki hai kyunki humne aapka na promotion kahin hold kiya, na kahin humne service dena aapko kam kiye hai. Jahan tak aap isko use nahi kar sakte. Saari cheez hamare yahan jaise har ek paid member ki run karti hai waise aapki bhi as it is chal rahi hai. To agar hoga sir to phir ye refund agar hum initiate bhi karte hain to phir wo pro rata basis pe hoga. Aaj main kal band karaunga to kal se hi aapka wo count ho payega.
Customer: To agar hai to aapne mujhe harassment kiya hai jo itne time se.
Executive: Sir harassment bhi abhi bhi main aapko ek cheez bol raha hoon. Nahi abhi bhi main bol raha hoon sir.
Customer: kiya hai ki aap jitna jaldi isko karenge utna hi aapko jyada dena padega. Jitna isko chewing gum ki tarah kheechenge utna hi aapko kam dena padega. Sir ye sab dekhiye nahi ek mahina ek din ya do din ya 10 din se nahi. Sir dekho hamara ye paisa bachana motive nahi hai. Agar hamara koi customer lose ho raha hai, customer hame chhod ke ja raha hai to hame pain us baat ka hota hai. Isme itni badi organization chal rahi hai sir usse hame problem nahi hai ki 10 din pehle hum aapka paisa refund karenge to ₹500 jyada hoga, 10 din baad karenge to ₹500.
Customer: Saare proof hai ki aapke jo executive ne kaise plan chipkaya hai. Puri recording hai, pure uske messages hai. Aap bolo to main sabhi dal deta hoon.
Executive: Sir dekhiye ye sab dekhiye wo aap sir dekho wo aap dal sakte hain. Agar aapko aisa lag raha hai aap bilkul dal sakte hain. Kahin bhi koi complaint aa sakte hain.
Customer: kar rahe ho sir. Jab aapne bol diya to main nahi kar sakta hoon to theek hai main nahi bol raha hoon.
Executive: Nahi main pro rata basis pe sir refund process kar sakta hoon. To isme main person ke liye escalate karun. Aap permission de tabhi main kar paunga sir. Agar aap mujhe approval de to main ise aage escalate karun refund ke liye kyunki service mujhe close karani padegi aur main aapko refund ke liye phir mujhe aage process karna padega. Usme bhi refund jo hoga seven to 10 working days mein aapke account mein jayega refund.
Customer: Ye dekho meri baat suno. Meri baat suno.
Customer: Agar aapki baat samajh mein aati hai to theek hai, nahi aati hai to phone abhi ke ek hi minute ke andar cut kar dena. Agar tumhare se pura payment wapas hota theek hai nahi to phone cut kar do bas.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Aur koi baat nahi karni. Mere paas itna time nahi hai tumhare se dimag kharab karne ka.
Executive: Pura payment to sir nahi wapas ho payega.
Customer: kar dena yaar. Kyun mera dimag kharab kar raha hai?
Customer: Band kar de. Jab tere hath mein hai hi nahi kuch bar bar phone kyun karta. Jiske hath mein kuch hai usko bol.
(silence)
Executive: Sir ye
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a full refund.

- Customer alleges harassment by executive.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the pro-rata refund policy.

- Executive offered to escalate the refund process.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will proceed with refund if approved.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, harassment, pro rata, policy
